class_notes:
Permission required prior to enrollment
(Class meets weekly, at different times each week)
course_description: First-year students will be introduced to the diversity of events available on campus and in the Atlanta area, and to learn how to find similar events in the future.  The class will attend an event each week, and engage in group discussion afterward.
sections: Class Nbr: 6063, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Wright/Bonning, Status: Open
